Description: Development of high quality production features and supporting infrastructure. Leveraging empathy for the client to understand problems thoroughly, and experience to design appropriate technical solutions.
Technical leadership that empowers groups of people to deliver high quality work.

Formal servant leadership that develops team members, advocates for them, supports their well being, and ensures an environment conducive to enabling effective work. Supporting the growth of the organization by working to improve processes.

Guarding and improving Medium's culture. Representing Medium externally and drawing attention to the team’s successes. Establishing Medium as an attractive place to work. Leveling-up the team by spreading knowledge and developing colleagues’ skills.
